title: wufeng123456
author: wufeng123456
content: Website: https://modestcoin.xyz/Block Explorer: http://modestchain.xyz/Not open yet Mining Pool: http://modestpool.xyz/Desktop Wallet: https://github.com/modestcoin/modestcoinThe mining pool is not open for the time being and only supports CPU solo.It’s not my project. I found it on Twitter. I have accumulated technology for a year and now it’s time to set sail.

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: Its already 30k blocks??What algo is this?! (edit: appears to be scrypt)No linux wallet, no daemon?? (edit: source files included, may compile)UGH... Windows users beware, be safe, install on a VM.

comments.author: MiningCoinsPool
comments.body: Quote from: Cynce on October 10, 2023, 01:54:12 PMIts already 30k blocks??What algo is this?! (edit: appears to be scrypt)No linux wallet, no daemon?? (edit: source files included, may compile)UGH... Windows users beware, be safe, install on a VM.Scam project be careful.

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: This sounds delightful. Glad I missed it then and will be happy to miss it now.

comments.author: BABY SHOES
comments.body: Quote from: MiningCoinsPool on October 10, 2023, 04:34:26 PMIt's almost a two years old project. The dev restarted the blockchain without caring of current holders, no swap no announcements. Now he's not paying people who've been mining in the official pool and get rid of the previous helpers by banning them because they defended the previous holders.What I see from the domain age is only 20 days, so not years and they are just trying to copy from another project that I found is almost the same as Bitweb. ANN - [ANN] Bitweb---a new open source p2p moneyQuote from: https://github.com/modestcoin/modestcoinModestcoin is an experimental digital currency that enables instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world. Modestcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Modestcoin Core is the name of open source software which enables the use of this currency.Quote from: https://github.com/bitweb-project/bitwebBitweb is an experimental digital currency that enables instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world. Bitweb uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Bitweb Core is the name of open source software which enables the use of this currency.
